${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ThornedWhip.NAME: Thorned Whip
${modID}:ThornedWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! temporary Thorns.

${modID}:CultivateLily.NAME: Cultivate Lily
${modID}:CultivateLily.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Bladed_Lily and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateDandelion.NAME: Cultivate Dandelion
${modID}:CultivateDandelion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Hardy_Dandelion and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateThistle.NAME: Cultivate Thistle
${modID}:CultivateThistle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Spiky_Thistle and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateIvy.NAME: Cultivate Ivy
${modID}:CultivateIvy.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Poison_Ivy and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateRose.NAME: Cultivate Rose
${modID}:CultivateRose.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Bloody_Rose and activate it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CultivateRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Bloody_Rose and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateSnapdragon.NAME: Cultivate Snapdragon
${modID}:CultivateSnapdragon.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Burning_Snapdragon and activate it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CultivateSnapdragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Burning_Snapdragon and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateSunflower.NAME: Cultivate Sunflower
${modID}:CultivateSunflower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Shining_Sunflower and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CultivateProtea.NAME: Cultivate Protea
${modID}:CultivateProtea.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Protea_of_Plenty and activate it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CultivateProtea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Grow a ${modID}:Protea_of_Plenty and activate it twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bury.NAME: Bury
${modID}:Bury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Stranglethorn.NAME: Stranglethorn
${modID}:Stranglethorn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:RevitalizingStrike.NAME: Revitalizing Strike
${modID}:RevitalizingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return the top card of your discard pile to your hand.
${modID}:RevitalizingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return the top !M! cards of your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:ScatterRoses.NAME: Scatter Roses
${modID}:ScatterRoses.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns.

${modID}:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Weakness
${modID}:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Weak or reduced Strength, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:VenomousScratch.NAME: Venomous Scratch
${modID}:VenomousScratch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison, twice.

${modID}:Replant.NAME: Replant
${modID}:Replant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:SolidRoots.NAME: Solid Roots
${modID}:SolidRoots.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Nurture the next card you draw.
${modID}:SolidRoots.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Nurture the next !M! cards you draw.

${modID}:ThornedSkin.NAME: Thorned Skin
${modID}:ThornedSkin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Thorns. Activate your Thorns on an enemy.

${modID}:BriarStorm.NAME: Briar Storm
${modID}:BriarStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to and activate your Thorns on ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChimericSeed.NAME: Chimeric Seed
${modID}:ChimericSeed.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FeedUponThem.NAME: Feed Upon Them
${modID}:FeedUponThem.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain !M! ${modID}:Fertility.

${modID}:ReturnToEarth.NAME: Return to Earth
${modID}:ReturnToEarth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Nurture !M! random cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:SaplingStrike.NAME: Sapling Strike
${modID}:SaplingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Return this to your draw pile.

${modID}:ScoutingStrike.NAME: Scouting Strike
${modID}:ScoutingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !B! Block and !M! temporary Thorns at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:Uproot.NAME: Uproot
${modID}:Uproot.DESCRIPTION: Destroy your oldest Plant to deal !D! damage.
${modID}:Uproot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Activate and destroy your oldest Plant to deal !D! damage.

${modID}:RegenerativeAcid.NAME: Regenerative Acid
${modID}:RegenerativeAcid.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. Gain Block equal to the enemy's Poison.

${modID}:AggressiveOccupation.NAME: Aggressive Occupation
${modID}:AggressiveOccupation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:ORBS! Plant slots for 3 turns. Put a random card with ${modID}:Bloom from your draw pile into your hand.
${modID}:AggressiveOccupation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:ORBS! Plant slots for 3 turns. Put !M! random cards with ${modID}:Bloom from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:AncientMist.NAME: Ancient Mist
${modID}:AncientMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${modID}:POISON! Poison and !${modID}:WEAK! Weak to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:Nettleweed.NAME: Nettleweed
${modID}:Nettleweed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have Thorns, play this again.

${modID}:CullWeeds.NAME: Cull Weeds
${modID}:CullWeeds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard the bottom half of your draw pile.

${modID}:HostileGarden.NAME: Hostile Garden
${modID}:HostileGarden.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, ${modID}:Bloom and gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:Ingrain.NAME: Ingrain
${modID}:Ingrain.DESCRIPTION: Nurture a card. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Ingrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Nurture a card. It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
${modID}:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Place up to !M! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. Gain [E] for each card placed.

${modID}:SeliLeaves.NAME: Seli Leaves
${modID}:SeliLeaves.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. Play this again at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SetSoil.NAME: Set Soil
${modID}:SetSoil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle a *Sudden *Growth into your draw pile.
${modID}:SetSoil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle !M! *Sudden *Growths into your draw pile.

${modID}:SowSeeds.NAME: Sow Seeds
${modID}:SowSeeds.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nurture the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

${modID}:Uprising.NAME: Uprising
${modID}:Uprising.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nurture the top X cards in your draw pile. Gain X [E] at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Uprising.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nurture the top X+1 cards in your draw pile. Gain X+1 [E] at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CarnivorousPlants.NAME: Carnivorous Plants
${modID}:CarnivorousPlants.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, for each Plant, deal !M! damage to a random enemy and gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FloweringSeason.NAME: Flowering Season
${modID}:FloweringSeason.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play !M! cards in a single turn, ${modID}:Bloom.

${modID}:ParalyticPoison.NAME: Paralytic Poison
${modID}:ParalyticPoison.DESCRIPTION: When you apply Poison, the enemy loses !M! Strength that turn.

${modID}:RampantGrowth.NAME: Rampant Growth
${modID}:RampantGrowth.DESCRIPTION: After you play a ${modID}:Nurtured card, ${modID}:Nurture it.
${modID}:RampantGrowth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After you play a ${modID}:Nurtured card, ${modID}:Nurture it. NL ${modID}:Nurture a card.

${modID}:ReactiveGrowth.NAME: Reactive Growth
${modID}:ReactiveGrowth.DESCRIPTION: When you lose HP, gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:LokiThorns.NAME: Loki Thorns
${modID}:LokiThorns.DESCRIPTION: When you deal damage with Thorns, apply Poison equal to the damage dealt. NL Gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:AbsorbingThorns.NAME: Absorbing Thorns
${modID}:AbsorbingThorns.DESCRIPTION: When you deal damage with Thorns, gain Block next turn equal to the damage dealt. NL Gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:Decompose.NAME: Decompose
${modID}:Decompose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, permanently ${modID}:Nurture a random card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DemonsRoots.NAME: Demon's Roots
${modID}:DemonsRoots.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${modID}:FlowerExecution.NAME: Flower Execution
${modID}:FlowerExecution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each !M! Thorns you have.

${modID}:SnowMoonFlowers.NAME: Snow, Moon, and Flowers
${modID}:SnowMoonFlowers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Subjugate.NAME: Subjugate
${modID}:Subjugate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CrystalShell.NAME: Crystal Shell
${modID}:CrystalShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Blur. Lose [E] [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DevilishGirl.NAME: Devilish Girl
${modID}:DevilishGirl.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your Draw Pile and place it into your hand. ${modID}:Nurture it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PathOfEvil.NAME: Path of Evil
${modID}:PathOfEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Double EVERYONE'S Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Reseed.NAME: Reseed
${modID}:Reseed.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw as many cards as you discarded and ${modID}:Nurture them. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Overthrow.NAME: Overthrow
${modID}:Overthrow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and put !M! card from your hand to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:FloralReflection.NAME: Floral Reflection
${modID}:FloralReflection.DESCRIPTION: Destroy all your Plants. For each Plant destroyed, your next card is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FloralReflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bloom. NL Destroy all your Plants. For each Plant destroyed, your next card is played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ApostleForm.NAME: Apostle Form
${modID}:ApostleForm.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card, ${modID}:Nurture it.
${modID}:ApostleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card, ${modID}:Nurture it twice.

${modID}:RoseGarden.NAME: Rose Garden
${modID}:RoseGarden.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:THORNS! Thorns. At the start of your next !M! turns, lose 5 Thorns.

${modID}:CrossPollination.NAME: Cross Pollination
${modID}:CrossPollination.DESCRIPTION: When you ${modID}:Bloom, gain !M! Fertility that turn. NL ${modID}:Bloom.

${modID}:SoldiersSeed.NAME: Soldier's Seed
${modID}:SoldiersSeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:KnightsSeed.NAME: Knight's Seed
${modID}:KnightsSeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PrincesSeed.NAME: Prince's Seed
${modID}:PrincesSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bloom twice. Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SeedsOfTheFuture.NAME: Seeds of the Future
${modID}:SeedsOfTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: Choose a ${modID}:Seed to create in hand. Shuffle the others into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SeedsOfTheFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an upgraded ${modID}:Seed to create in hand. Shuffle the others into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
